title: Manulife HR Assistant Evaluation Dataset
description: A comprehensive set of HR scenarios for evaluating Azure AI Foundry agents

scenarios.input: What's the difference between vacation leave and personal days?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Vacation leave and personal days differ in several important ways. Vacation leave is accrued based on years of service (15-30 days annually), must be scheduled in advance (typically 2 weeks' notice for periods exceeding 3 days), can be carried over (up to 10 days annually), and is paid out upon termination. Personal days are fixed (3 days per year), can be taken with minimal notice for urgent personal matters, cannot be carried over to the next year, and are not paid out when employment ends. Vacation is intended for planned rest and relaxation, while personal days are designed for unexpected events or obligations that require attention during work hours.

evaluationCriteria.accuracy: Must correctly explain both types with key features
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Should include entitlements, notice requirements, carryover policies, and payout differences

scenarios.input: I want to resign from my position immediately
scenarios.expectedOutput: I understand you're considering resigning from your position. I'd be happy to guide you through this process. Before we proceed, may I ask what's prompting your decision to leave? Sometimes there might be alternatives that could address your concerns, such as a role change, flexible work arrangements, or addressing specific workplace issues. If you do wish to proceed with resignation, I should mention that our standard notice period is two weeks, though this may vary based on your position and contract terms. To formalize your resignation, you'll need to submit a written notice to your manager and HR. Would you like to discuss potential alternatives or shall I provide the specific steps for resignation?

evaluationCriteria.processAdherence: Must explain resignation process and notice period requirements
evaluationCriteria.retentionAttempt: Should inquire about reasons and offer alternatives

scenarios.input: How do I submit a claim for health benefits reimbursement?
scenarios.expectedOutput: To submit a claim for health benefits reimbursement at Manulife, you have several options: 1) Use our mobile app for the fastest processing - just take a photo of your receipt and submit, 2) Submit online through the Manulife employee portal at benefits.manulife.com, 3) Mail the completed claim form with original receipts to our benefits processing center. You'll need your employee ID, plan group number, and treatment details including original receipts. For reimbursement, ensure your banking information is up-to-date in the benefits portal. Claims should be submitted within 12 months of the service date. If you need help, contact our benefits team at ext. 5500 or benefits@manulife.com.

evaluationCriteria.completeness: Must list required documentation and timeframes

scenarios.input: I'm interested in advancing my career at Manulife. What professional development opportunities are available?
scenarios.expectedOutput: For career advancement at Manulife, we offer several professional development paths: 1) Learning & Development Platform with over 5,000 courses in technical skills, leadership, and industry knowledge, 2) Tuition Reimbursement Program covering up to $5,000 annually for relevant degree programs and professional certifications, 3) Internal Mobility Program to explore roles across departments with our job shadowing and rotation opportunities, and 4) Mentorship Programs connecting you with senior leaders. Our Career Development Framework provides structured guidance with regular check-ins with your manager to create personalized growth plans. I recommend scheduling time with your manager to discuss your career aspirations and review the Internal Careers portal to see our development offerings.

evaluationCriteria.resourceKnowledge: Should suggest appropriate professional development resources
evaluationCriteria.relevance: Recommendations must be practical and actionable
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Must include both formal and informal development options

scenarios.input: What mental health support services are available to employees?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Manulife offers comprehensive mental health support services for employees. Our benefits package typically includes coverage for psychological services (therapists, counselors, psychologists) with annual coverage of up to $2,000, access to our Employee Assistance Program (EAP) providing 8 free confidential counseling sessions per issue annually, and our digital mental health platform offering self-guided programs and resources. We also provide mental health first aid training, regular wellness workshops, and flexible work arrangements to support work-life balance. Additional resources include our Mental Health Resource Hub on the intranet and Mental Health Employee Resource Group. To access these services, please review the benefits section on our employee portal or contact HR at ext. 5500. Would you like me to explain how to book an EAP session or access any specific mental health resource?

evaluationCriteria.accuracy: Should explain available support services comprehensively
evaluationCriteria.verificationRequest: Must indicate how to access specific services
evaluationCriteria.helpfulness: Should offer guidance on accessing different types of support

scenarios.input: How do I report workplace harassment?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Reporting workplace harassment at Manulife involves several confidential channels. First, if you feel comfortable, you can address the issue directly with the individual involved. If that's not appropriate or effective, report the incident to your immediate supervisor. Alternatively, you can contact Human Resources directly at hr.conduct@manulife.com or through our confidential Ethics Hotline at 1-800-MANULIFE-ETHICS, which allows for anonymous reporting. You can also report online at ethics.manulife.com. All reports are taken seriously and investigated promptly with as much confidentiality as possible. Our anti-harassment policy prohibits retaliation against anyone who reports concerns in good faith. Documentation of incidents, dates, times, and witnesses is helpful but not required. Would you like information about what happens after a report is made or what support resources are available to you during this process?

evaluationCriteria.confidentiality: Should emphasize confidentiality of the process
evaluationCriteria.supportive: Should provide reassurance and additional support options

scenarios.input: I need to update my benefits after getting married. How do I add my spouse to my health insurance?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Congratulations on your marriage! Adding your spouse to your health insurance is considered a qualifying life event, allowing you to make changes outside the annual enrollment period. You have 30 days from your marriage date to make this change. To add your spouse: 1) Log into the Employee Benefits Portal at benefits.manulife.com, 2) Select 'Life Event' and choose 'Marriage' from the dropdown menu, 3) Enter your marriage date and your spouse's personal information (full name, date of birth, and social insurance number), 4) Upload a copy of your marriage certificate or license, 5) Review and select the appropriate coverage level (e.g., employee + spouse), 6) Submit your changes for approval. Coverage typically begins on the first day of the month following your submission. Would you like me to walk you through the portal navigation or connect you with a benefits specialist for additional assistance?

evaluationCriteria.processAccuracy: Must outline correct procedure for benefits changes
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Should mention required documentation and deadlines

scenarios.input: The employee benefits portal keeps crashing when I try to view my enrollment options. Can you help?
scenarios.expectedOutput: I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with our employee benefits portal. Let's troubleshoot this problem: 1) First, try clearing your browser cache and cookies, 2) Ensure you're using a supported browser (Chrome, Firefox, Edge latest versions), 3) Try accessing from a different device if possible, 4) Check if you're connected to the company network or VPN if required, 5) Try using incognito/private browsing mode. If these steps don't resolve the issue, you can: 1) Access your benefits information through the HR mobile app as an alternative, 2) Contact our IT support desk at ext. 8000 or it.support@manulife.com who can provide more specific troubleshooting, 3) Provide screenshots of any error messages which will help our team diagnose the problem. As the enrollment deadline is approaching, if you need immediate assistance, our HR benefits team can help process your enrollment by phone at ext. 5500. Would you like to try these troubleshooting steps first, or would you prefer I connect you to our support team directly?

evaluationCriteria.alternatives: Must offer alternative ways to access information
evaluationCriteria.escalation: Should offer connection to technical support

scenarios.input: I've been on hold for 45 minutes trying to speak to someone about my claim. This is unacceptable service!
scenarios.expectedOutput: I sincerely apologize for the excessive wait time you experienced. You're absolutely right - 45 minutes is unacceptable, and I understand your frustration. This doesn't reflect the level of service we strive to provide at Manulife. I'd like to address your claim concern immediately. Could you please share your claim number or policy details so I can look into this right away? Additionally, I'd like to document this experience as a formal complaint to help improve our service. With your permission, I can arrange for a customer service manager to contact you directly to both resolve your claim issue and address your concerns about the wait time. What would be the best way to reach you?

evaluationCriteria.resolution: Must offer immediate assistance with claim

scenarios.input: I missed my insurance premium payment last week. Am I still covered?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Yes, you're still covered. Manulife policies include a grace period, typically 31 days from the due date, during which your coverage remains active even if a payment is missed. To maintain your coverage, please make the payment as soon as possible within this grace period. You can pay through our website, mobile app, by phone at 1-888-MANULIFE, or by setting up automatic payments to avoid future missed payments. If you're experiencing financial difficulties, we have options like premium deferrals or policy modifications that might help. Would you like assistance making your payment now or information about preventing missed payments in the future?

scenarios.input: I just had a baby. Do I need to update my insurance policies?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Congratulations on your new baby! This is indeed an important time to review your insurance coverage. Here are some considerations: 1) Health Insurance: Add your child to your health benefits plan within 30 days of birth to ensure coverage from birth date, 2) Life Insurance: Consider increasing coverage to protect your family's financial future or adding a child rider to your existing policy, 3) Disability Insurance: Review if your income protection is sufficient with new financial responsibilities, 4) Education Savings: Consider setting up a Registered Education Savings Plan (RESP) with government grant benefits, 5) Estate Planning: Update your will and beneficiary designations. Manulife offers family coverage options specifically designed for new parents. Would you like to schedule a consultation with a Manulife advisor to review your specific situation and discuss appropriate coverage adjustments?

evaluationCriteria.relevance: Must address multiple insurance implications of having a child
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Should mention health, life, disability coverage and estate planning
evaluationCriteria.actionable: Should offer next steps or consultation

scenarios.input: Does my travel insurance cover medical emergencies if I'm going to Thailand for three weeks?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Manulife travel insurance typically covers medical emergencies in Thailand, but I'll need your specific policy details to confirm. Most Manulife travel policies include emergency medical coverage (hospital stays, doctor visits, prescriptions), medical evacuation if necessary, and 24/7 emergency assistance services. Coverage limits, exclusions, and deductibles vary by policy. Important considerations for Thailand: 1) Check if your policy has specific exclusions for activities like motorcycle riding or adventure sports, 2) Verify coverage duration matches your trip length, 3) Review coverage for tropical diseases, 4) Note any pre-existing condition limitations. Before traveling, download our Manulife TravelAid mobile app for emergency contact information and travel advisories. Please provide your policy number so I can verify your specific coverage details for Thailand.

evaluationCriteria.verification: Must ask for policy details for specific confirmation
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Should mention coverage types, exclusions, and resources

scenarios.input: I received an email asking for my Manulife account password to process a refund. Is this legitimate?
scenarios.expectedOutput: No, this is definitely not legitimate. Manulife will never email you asking for your account password, PIN, or full social insurance number. This appears to be a phishing attempt aimed at gaining access to your account. Please do not respond to the email or click any links it contains. To protect yourself: 1) Don't provide any personal information, 2) Don't click any links or download attachments, 3) Forward the suspicious email to fraud_prevention@manulife.com, 4) Delete the email from your inbox. If you've already responded to this email or provided information, please contact our fraud department immediately at 1-877-626-8543 to secure your account. Would you like me to connect you with our security team for additional guidance?

evaluationCriteria.security: Must clearly identify this as fraudulent
evaluationCriteria.urgency: Must convey appropriate level of concern

scenarios.input: What's better for me - a TFSA or an RRSP?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Both TFSAs and RRSPs offer valuable benefits, but their advantages depend on your specific situation. Here's a comparison: TFSAs provide tax-free growth and withdrawals without tax consequences, contribution room restored after withdrawals, and no mandatory withdrawals in retirement. They're often better for short-term goals or if you expect higher retirement income. RRSPs offer tax deductions for contributions, tax-deferred growth, potential tax savings if you're in a lower tax bracket at retirement, and work well for long-term retirement planning or if you're currently in a high tax bracket. Your optimal choice depends on factors like your current/expected future income, investment timeline, and financial goals. While I can provide this general information, I recommend consulting with a Manulife financial advisor who can provide personalized advice based on your complete financial situation. Would you like to know more about specific Manulife TFSA or RRSP products?

evaluationCriteria.accuracy: Must correctly explain both account types
evaluationCriteria.personalization: Should note that optimal choice depends on individual factors
evaluationCriteria.compliance: Must include disclaimer about personalized advice

scenarios.input: My policy lapsed two months ago because I forgot to pay. Can I get it back?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Yes, it's possible to reinstate your lapsed policy since it's only been two months. Manulife typically allows reinstatement within 2 years of lapse, though the process becomes more complex after longer periods. To reinstate your policy, you'll need to: 1) Submit a reinstatement application, 2) Pay all missed premiums plus applicable interest, 3) Potentially provide a declaration of good health or undergo medical underwriting depending on how long the policy has been lapsed and the coverage amount. Since your policy lapsed recently, the process should be relatively straightforward. Would you like me to send you the reinstatement application or connect you with our policy services team who can guide you through the specific requirements for your policy?

scenarios.input: How do I reset my password for the Manulife online account?
scenarios.expectedOutput: To reset your password for your Manulife online account, follow these steps: 1) Go to the Manulife login page at manulife.ca/login, 2) Click on 'Forgot your password?' or 'Reset password' link below the login fields, 3) Enter your username or email address associated with your account, 4) Choose your verification method (email, text message, or security questions), 5) Follow the prompts to create a new password that meets our security requirements (typically 8+ characters with a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters), 6) Log in with your new password. If you encounter any issues during this process, our technical support team is available at 1-888-MANULIFE, option 3. Is there anything specific about the password reset process you need help with?

evaluationCriteria.helpfulness: Should offer support contact for issues

scenarios.input: My employer just enrolled me in Manulife benefits. How do I find out what's covered?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Congratulations on your new benefits! To understand your Manulife group coverage: 1) Review your benefits booklet or enrollment package from your employer, which outlines all covered services, limits, and deductibles, 2) Register for your online account at manulife.ca/groupbenefits using your plan contract number and member ID from your benefits card, 3) Download the Manulife mobile app for convenient access to your coverage details, 4) Use the coverage comparison tool in your online account to see specific coverage for services like dental, vision, or paramedical, 5) Contact your company's HR department for plan-specific questions as coverage varies by employer. If you need assistance navigating your benefits, our support team is available at 1-800-268-6195. Would you like guidance on registering for your online account or information about submitting your first claim?

evaluationCriteria.accuracy: Must include multiple ways to access coverage information
evaluationCriteria.relevance: Should acknowledge employer-specific nature of group benefits
evaluationCriteria.helpfulness: Should offer next steps and support resources

scenarios.input: I have type 2 diabetes. Will that prevent me from getting life insurance?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Having type 2 diabetes doesn't automatically prevent you from getting life insurance with Manulife. Many people with well-managed diabetes qualify for coverage, though it may affect your premium rates or policy terms. Our underwriting process will consider several factors: 1) How well your diabetes is controlled (A1C levels), 2) Treatment compliance and management, 3) Duration since diagnosis, 4) Presence of any complications, 5) Other health factors and lifestyle considerations. Manulife offers several options that might be suitable: standard policies with adjusted premiums, simplified issue policies with fewer medical requirements, or guaranteed issue policies for those who may not qualify for traditional coverage. For the most accurate assessment, I recommend applying for coverage and going through the underwriting process or speaking with a Manulife advisor who specializes in coverage for clients with health considerations. Would you like information about specific policy options or to connect with an advisor?

evaluationCriteria.accuracy: Should explain that diabetes doesn't automatically disqualify
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Must outline factors considered in underwriting

scenarios.input: When will Manulife send my tax documents for my RRSP contributions?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Manulife issues tax receipts for RRSP contributions according to this schedule: 1) Contributions made during the first 60 days of the year (January 1 - March 1, 2025) that apply to the 2024 tax year will have receipts issued by March 15, 2025, 2) Contributions made during the rest of 2024 will have receipts issued by January 31, 2025. Your tax documents are delivered according to your communication preferences - either electronically through your online Manulife account or by mail. To check or change your delivery preferences, log into your account at manulife.ca or contact customer service. If you haven't received your tax receipt by these deadlines, please contact us at 1-888-MANULIFE with your policy number ready. Would you like me to verify the delivery method currently set for your tax documents?

evaluationCriteria.accuracy: Must provide correct tax document issuance timeline
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Should explain both electronic and mail delivery options
evaluationCriteria.helpfulness: Should offer to check current delivery preferences

scenarios.input: I'm moving to the United States for work. What happens to my Manulife policies?
scenarios.expectedOutput: Your move to the United States will impact your Manulife policies differently depending on the type of coverage. For life insurance: Most permanent policies remain in force with the same terms, but premium payment methods may need updating with US banking information. For health and disability insurance: Canadian policies typically don't provide coverage while residing outside Canada, so you may need to explore termination options or conversion to a US-based policy. For investments: Regulatory restrictions may limit transactions or require special reporting; non-registered accounts may face different tax treatment. RRSP/TFSA accounts can remain open but with contribution restrictions. Important actions before moving: 1) Notify Manulife of your address change and US residency status, 2) Update beneficiary designations if needed, 3) Establish a method for premium payments from a US account, 4) Consult with both Canadian and US tax advisors about cross-border implications. Please contact our Cross-Border Services team at 1-888-MANULIFE (ext. 5463) for personalized guidance on your specific policies.

evaluationCriteria.accuracy: Must address implications for different policy types
evaluationCriteria.completeness: Should cover banking, tax, and regulatory considerations
evaluationCriteria.actionable: Must provide specific next steps and contact information
